head.title: TrueChain-High performance infinite nodes hybrid consensus public blockchain
head.keyword: True，TrueChain，Eric zhang，blockchain, hybrid consensus, Xiaoyong Cheng, Larry Lin
head.description: TrueChain is the first public chain in the world which brings about the technology of hybrid consensus combining PBFT and POW. It solves the biggest problem confronting public blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

home.slogan: Truly Fast, Permissionless, Secure and Scalable
home.slogan1: PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus public blockchain with global developer community

superiority.title: Tackles the Obstacles of Public Blockchain
superiority.detail: The conflict between  efficiency and decentralization for public blockchain is solved by TrueChain with its permissionless PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus with secure sharding.

superiority.title: Ensures  Decentralization and Fairness
superiority.detail: Using Fruitchain as Snailchain to replace Nakamoto PoW with fPoW, TrueChain ensures  decentralization and fairness for the new generation of public blockchain.

superiority.title: The First  Hybrid Consensus Incentive Model
superiority.detail: TrueChain is the first in the world to design an incentive model for the governance of the hybrid consensus which impart economic awareness to blockchain technology

superiority.title: Stable and Low Gas Fee Mechanism
superiority.detail: Zero gas fee is impossible for public blockchain, nonetheless, TrueChain designs a stable and relatively low gas fee mechanism for more DApps to be built on it.

superiority.title: Strong Global Developer Community
superiority.detail: Among the new generation of public blockchains, TrueChain has a developer community that is the largest in China and the fastest growing in the world.

superiority.title: Open Sourced Grid of Products
superiority.detail: TrueChain brings a grid of products that support the hybrid consensus public blockchain platform and makes the chain easy to use, and they are open source!

about.title: ABOUT
about.subhead: TrueChain is a truly fast, permissionless, secure and scalable public blockchain platform which is supported by the PBFT and fPoW hybrid consensus technology and a global developer community.
contentList: Many public chains based on single consensus mechanism such as PoW or PoS, are having a bottleneck in efficiency. One the other hand, those based on dPoS or dBFT have been improved in efficiency, but are having problems in decentralization. TrueChain uses hybrid consensus combining PBFT and fPoW to solve the biggest problem confronting public blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

It uses PBFT as fast-chain to process transactions, and leave the oversight and election of PBFT to the hands of  PoW nodes. Besides, TrueChain integrates fruitchain technology into the traditional PoW protocol  i.e. fPoW, as the snailchain, to make the chain even more decentralized and fair. TrueChain also added sharding on top of PBFT to lift the limit of scalability.

With solid and leading technology, TrueChain aims to provide a workable and well-governed blockchain platform for decentralized economy. It comes up with the first hybrid consensus incentive model to use economic awareness as a drive to uphold and improve the chain. Meanwhile, it also creates a stable gas fee mechanism to lower the cost for the developers and operators of DApps, and to make the blockchain more public.

As a platform, TrueChain builds an all-inclusive community to attract the worldwide developers and entrepreneurs to be part of it, to join the decentralized economy revolution. Not only TrueChain has a global developer community, it also has a  grid of products that are handy for the developers, and they are open sourced which allows them to be more user oriented.
The team of TrueChain is international with its members from India, the United States, China, etc.

events: Stellar-the platform to deploy and manage the full life cycle of smart contracts released
TrueChain’s engineering roadmap released on github
TrueChain’s election system for decentralized nodes released
Hybrid consensus framework code open source
fPOW basic framework complete and open source
TrueChain mainnet launch （only open to priority nodes）

head.title: TrueChain news-TrueChain Updates, TrueChain posts
head.keyword: TrueChain news-TrueChain flash, digital currency news, TRUE
head.description: TrueChain news section provides real-time information about TrueChain, news and real-time information in the field of blockchain.

head.title: TrueChain team-TrueChain
head.keyword: TrueChain team members, TRUE, Blockchain expert, digital currency expert, Blockchain Talents
head.description: The leading research and engineering team members of True Chain come from the U.S., India and China.

list.name: Eric Zhang
list.intro: The co-founder and CEO of TrueChain. Eric Zhang graduated from Oxford University with a master’s degree in computer science. He used to work at CERN-the European Organization for Nuclear Research focusing on decentralized computation. He’s also the founder of Dorahacks which is now the largest Hacker community with great reach. He’s one of the most influential organizer of Hackathon among the young generation dedicated to use technology to solve problems in the real business world.

list.name: Archit Sharma
list.intro: TrueChain’s tech lead responsible for TrueChain’s engineering and engineering team management. Archit Sharma is an expert at distributed system, operation systems and performance engineering. Archit has worked in Red Hat and CERN, engaged in large-scale cloud service and distributed system design and development. Archit is a contributor of several important open source projects, as well as several Hackathon champions.

list.name: Home Chen
list.intro: TrueChain’s CTO in the greater China area. Home Chen has worked in IT industry for 20 years. He has rich experience in Internet product design and development, and software project management. He was a technical partner of “CaiHuohuo”, responsible for the research and development of new products, server cluster and high concurrent processing.

list.name: Felix Cai
list.intro: The front-end product leader of TrueChain, also a front-end geek. Felix Cai graduated from Xi'an Jiao Tong University youth class.

list.name: Ice Ming
list.intro: Golang engineer,over 10 years experience in c/c++ development, responsible for bid projects, has strong learning ability, has the full package of project experience in real-time database products and digital currency transaction platform products. He has participated in developing bitcoin and ethereum wallets.

list.name: Liu Yang
list.intro: Got his bachelor's and master's degree in Tsinghua University. He has over 10 years’ experience in development and system architecture. He is an expert at cryptography and building algorithms. He is responsible for the research and development of hybrid consensus and POW of TrueChain.

list.name: Seay (Wizard)
list.intro: The security consultant of TrueChain, the author of “Code Audit: Enterprise Edition Web Code Security Architecture”, Seay source code security audit system author, and the blogger of well-known security blog “cnseay.com”. He once served at Alibaba security, and was the leader of Ali attack and defense laboratory, Sobug technology partner. Seay has experience of more than ten years in security attack and defense and served for several well-known enterprises.

list.name: Robin Zhang
list.intro: BS，MS of Tsinghua University and MS of SUNY at Buffalo. As the expert of network communications, Mr. Zhang has more than 18 years of working experience in Silicon Valley and China. He is responsible for the implementation of hybrid consensus and POW of TrueChain.

list.name: Xiaoyong Cheng
list.intro: The co-founder of TrueChain, Chief Strategic Officer. XiaoYong Cheng is a serial entrepreneur, executive director of China Cloud System Pioneer Strategic Alliance. He is also a member of Youth Leader in Changan Club.

list.name: Hongyi Zheng
list.intro: TrueChain’s Chief Operating Officer, mainly responsible for DApp business cooperation and development. Hongyi Zheng is the founder of Micro-Blocks and Smart Web Loan. He was the former Chief Operation Officer of the software release center of Kaspersky, the CEO of Zhuoxin group, CEO of Anhe Foundation, and the operation head of the Monternet business of China Mobile. He graduated from Harbin Institute of Technology.

list.name: Larry Lin
list.intro: The co-founder of TrueChain, chief development officer. Larry Lin is an expert of Internet marketing and community operation. He has been responsible for the operation of ‘Baidu encyclopedia’, which is the largest co-building community in China. Lin has more than 10 years of digital advertising and Internet industry experience, and was the author of several bestsellers in propaganda.

list.name: Yan Liu
list.intro: TrueChain’s chief operation officer. He is responsible for TrueChain products and business operations, as well as TrueChain’s community building and operation.

list.name: Wen Yan
list.intro: Market Director of TrueChain. Wen Yan graduated from the School of Journalism, University of Missouri - Columbia. During her stay in the United States, she once worked for Bankrate.com in Washington. D.C. focusing on the Federal Reserve. She later works for Sina Finance as a business reporter, having interviewed some of the biggest financial figures including the head of IMF, the Financial Minister of Denmark and Netherlands. She was also the market manager for Zenwater crowd funding platform.

list.name: Yushi Shen
list.intro: The Secretary-General of China Cloud System Pioneer Strategic Alliance. Yushi Shen got his bachelor’s degree in Electronic Engineering from Tsinghua University, master’s and doctor’s degree in computer science from University of California, San Diego. He’s a panelist for China’s “the Thousand Talents Plan”, also a research staff of Tsinghua and other prestigious universities. He was the strategic consultant for Microsoft, the person in charge of the government affairs and business development of cloud computing in the Great China area. He used to work at Microsoft as a senior software architect in the headquarter of Microsoft.

list.name: Xianhua Wei
list.intro: The professor and PhD tutor of Chinese Academy of Sciences. Xianhua Wei is also the deputy director of the virtual economy and data science research center of Chinese Academy of Sciences, and the executive director of the CAS - Reuters financial risk management joint laboratory.

list.name: Jamie Cooper
list.intro: Global intellectual property legal expert, the professor of California Western School of Law, chairman of Proyecto ACCESO foundation project, former United States State Department, American Development Bank, American patent and Trademark Office consultant, United States representative of the world intellectual property organization.

list.name: Jinglong Zhou
list.intro: The former partner of the GWC, which is the world's largest Internet Organization. He has a wide range of connections and resources of Internet industry and governments all over the world.

list.name: Jun Zou
list.intro: The author of best seller "block chain technology guide", also an expert of Zhongguancun block chain industry alliance. He is a PhD in Service Contract, the former chief software architect of IBM Australian financial industry, and have published more than 200 papers in the International Conference on IEEE, of which block chain related papers were awarded to IEEE ICWS in 2016.

list.name: Yu Zhu (binke)
list.intro: The head of the Block Chain and the New retail Research Institute, the first head of the new retailing (O2O) department of Alibaba Group. He became the vice president of Shopin Enterprise in 2015, taking charge of offline entities and online overall work. He has rich experience in complete digitization and full channel communication, and digital marketing business.

list.name: Xiong Li
list.intro: The founder of LianXiang Finance and Economics.

honor.title: honor
honor.text1: TrueChain was approved of the License for the China Cloud System Industrial Innovation Strategic Alliance On the morning of May 20, 2018, the co-founder of TrueChain, Cheng Xiao Yong, received the committee member institutional license of China Cloud System Industrial Innovation Strategic Alliance awarded by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.
honor.text2: TrueChain becomes a member of the National Chain Network Innovation Center The chairman of the center is Xie Ping. He was the deputy general manager of the former China Investment Co., Ltd. (Deputy ministerial level) , the director of the former Central Bank Financial Stability Bureau, the former director of the Central Bank Research Bureau and the head of the Central Bank Financial Research Institute .

head.title: TrueChain recruitment website
head.keyword: TrueChain, TRUE, recruitment website,blockchain, blockchain employee, digital currency
head.description: TrueChain welcome more people come to join us.

join.title: JOIN US
join.intro: Welcome the creative, passionate and sincere you to join us, Sail with us!
join.p1: Once you join us, you will get training while working. You will benefit from the accumulated professional experience from us. Join us and you will be added in the TrueChain employee career development training program.
join.p2: Training is not only a requirement for the continuous improvement and development of each employee's quality and potential, but also an important process to achieve the company’s success.

jobs.title: Go development engineer
duty: Use Go language to design and develop the TrueChain product.
Participate in the software architecture design of the blockchain platform, study the key technologies of the blockchain infrastructure.
Responsible for development related to blockchain core layer (transaction, message, virtual machine EVM).
Work closely with product/design/front-end development/test team, deliver blockchain development tasks on time
Other works arranged by senior leadership
require: Have more than 2 years’ experience in project development;
Familiar with golang language programming, master multithreading;
Experienced in high load, high concurrent development design is preferred;
Have solid computer programming capabilities, especially skilled in the data structure, algorithms and code, software design ;
Familiar with the fabric or Ethereum development.

duty: Use Go language to design and develop the TrueChain product.

Responsible for development related to blockchain core layer (transaction, message, virtual machine EVM).
Work closely with product/design/front-end development/test team, deliver blockchain development tasks on time

Familiar with golang language programming, master multithreading;
Experienced in high load, high concurrent development design is preferred;
Have solid computer programming capabilities, especially skilled in the data structure, algorithms and code, software design ;

jobs.title: Investor Relations Director
jobs.requireNum: 2 people (one based in the United States, fluent in English speaking and writing)
duty: Responsible for the maintenance of institutional investor relations, directs and organizes meet-up for the mainstream Blockchain Foundation in China and the United States, and negotiate potential cooperation.
require: Familiar with the blockchain investment field, can prepare relevant materials and investment proposals .
Financial related background, FA background or public listed company fundraising and private fund raising background, financial technology industry
Flexibility and integrity, bold in both thinking and action, can quickly learn the basic knowledge and the market structure of the blockchain .
jobs.salary: Basic salary about 30,000 plus commission (linked to the volume of fund-raising, holding time, fund visibility, etc.)

head.title: TrueChain priority nodes election
head.keyword: TrueChain,TRUE, nodes election, super nodes, blockchain, digital currency
head.description: TrueChain will select no more than 4000 priority standard nodes (POW) and no more than 100 priority master nodes (PBFT+POW) by votes before the test main network released in September.
